dcterms:creator: X. Chen
H. Fang
T. Y. Lin
R. Vedantam
S. Gupta
P. Dollar
C. L. Zitnick
dcterms:description: Microsoft COCO Captions dataset provides a large-scale dataset for image captioning, containing images with multiple captions that describe the content of the images.
dcterms:title: COCO-DIC

dcterms:creator: B. A. Plummer
L. Wang
C. M. Cervantes
J. C. Caicedo
S. Lazebnik
dcterms:description: Flickr30K Entities dataset contains images with region-to-phrase correspondences, allowing for richer image-to-sentence models.
dcterms:title: Flickr30K-DIC

dcterms:creator: Jiuniu Wang
Wenjia Xu
Qingzhong Wang
Antoni B Chan
dcterms:description: Dataset proposed by Wang et al. focuses on group-based distinctive image captioning with memory attention, providing a benchmark for reference-based distinctive image captioning.
dcterms:title: Wang et.al. [52] dataset for Ref-DIC
